import React from "react"; import shortId from "shortid"; const Movie = ({ title, release_date, vote_average, genres, poster_path, original_title, backdrop_path, overview, onGoback, }) => (

{title}({release_date})

User Score: {popularity}%

{overview}

    {genres && genres.length > 0 && genres.map((e) =>
  • {e.name}
    • )}
); export default Movie;
